name: Nitro Mobile Solutions
description:
Nitro is a software technology and services company providing organizations with tools for streamlining business processes through superior technology and unparalleled consulting expertise.
We are a team of technology trailblazers. We are designers, developers, creators and pioneers. We tell all of our clients to dream big, because that's what we do. Our talent, industry knowledge and highly collaborative process ensure that we transform your ideas, from conception to delivery, into next-gerneration software products - putting you lightyears ahead of competitors and growing your business along the way.
Nitro was built on the premise that mobile technology is more than creating mobile apps - it's about tackling business problems and maximizing the benefits of business practices. Due to the rate of change in the technology industry, Nitro lives in a state of constant evolution - guaranteeing our clients the most effective, innovative solutions possible. Today, that means offering a complete Internet of Things ecosystem equipped to incorporate wearable technologies, virtual reality, or any other technical novelty that hits the market.
